addNetworks.title: Sɛgɛsɛgɛli Kura Fara
addNetworks.description: Butɔn dɔ digi duguma ka Sɛgɛsɛgɛli fara i ka bɔrɔsiɲɛbara kan. Nin b'a nɔgɔya ka taa sɛgɛsɛgɛli wɛrɛ la n'i bɛ kɔrɔbɔli la.

convert.noConvertibleTokens: Token minw bɛ se ka dugu te yen {{chainName}} kan
convert.addTokenError: Token ma se ka fara bɔrɔsiɲɛbara kan
convert.legacyTokenMissing: Token kɔrɔ tɛ yen nin sɛgɛsɛgɛli kama
convert.tigerOGMissing: TigerOG token tɛ yen nin sɛgɛsɛgɛli kama

networkWarning.title: Sɛgɛsɛgɛli Tiɲɛnen
networkWarning.message: Datugu ni Bɔli bɛ sɔrɔ BSC Chain dɔrɔn kan.
networkWarning.description: Aw ye taa BSC Chain kan aw ka bɔrɔsiɲɛbara kɔnɔ ka tokenw datugu, walima aw ye taa Jago tab kan ka tokenw taa sɛgɛsɛgɛli wɛrɛ la.

bridge.noBridgeableTokens: Token minw bɛ se ka jago te yen
bridge.addTokenError: Token ma se ka fara bɔrɔsiɲɛbara kan
bridge.historyStoredLocally: Baara tɔgɔla maralen bɛ minɛn in kɔnɔ

settings.title: Labɛnni
settings.rpcEndpointsHelp: RPC URL kura min bɛ kɛ sɛgɛsɛgɛli bɛɛ ye sigida sugandilen na.
settings.noChainsConfigured: Sɛgɛsɛgɛli si labɛnna nin sigida kama.

login.title: I Sɛgɛnna Ɲuman
login.subtitle: Don walasa ka taa Hɔrɔnya Jago la
login.rememberMe: N hakili to n na nin minɛn in na

validation.required: Bataki ni daɲɛgafe ka kan ka kɛ.

banner.title: I fɔlɔ la yan wa?
banner.message: A dɔn Hɔrɔnya Jago kan ani i bɛ se ka bɔ token sarali la cogo min na.

hero.title: I Ka <1/> <2>Nafenfɛnw</2> Bɔ
hero.subtitle: Bɔ token sarali kɔrɔw la. I ka tokenw dugu sɛgɛsɛgɛli cɛla nafenfɛn kɔrɔlen ni lafiya ye ani ka taa cogo lafiya la sɛgɛsɛgɛliw cɛ.

features.title: Yamaruya Tɛ Interoperability
features.description: Hɔrɔnya Jago bɛ Axelar sariya ta ka jago lafiya, kɔrɔlen ani sara t'a la di {{count}}+ sɛgɛsɛgɛli cɛ.

stopDecay.title: Tiɲɛni Lɔ
stopDecay.description: Token kɔrɔw bɛ 10-11% jɛni i ka nafa la san ni feere bɛɛ la. Dugu bɛ nin joli lɔ joona, ka i ka san fanga 100% mara baara bɛɛ la.

conversion.title: 1:1 Dugu
conversion.description: Di bɛɛ tɛ yɛlɛma abada. Tokenw datugulen bɛ mara lafiya la, ani 1:1 bɛ dilan. Yiriwali tɛ, jɛya tɛ.

multichain.title: Sɛgɛsɛgɛli Caman
multichain.description: Dilan siɲɛ kelen, sɔrɔ yɔrɔ bɛɛ. I ka nafenfɛn bɛ kɛ dugu den ye {{count}}+ sɛgɛsɛgɛli kan, Ethereum, BNB Chain, Base, ani Optimism bɛ a la.

security.title: Kɔrɔlen Sɛgɛ
security.description: Axelar ka kɔrɔlen tɔn bɛ a la. Sɛgɛsɛgɛli Cɛ Kɔrɔlen (ISMs) b'a to i ka cira bɛ sɛgɛsɛgɛ sɛgɛsɛgɛli kan sani nafa si ka taa.

teaser.title: I bɛ wari wɛrɛw fɛ wa?
teaser.subtitle: I hakili bɛ mun na <lunc>LUNC</lunc>, <crepe>Crepe</crepe>, walima <shiba>Shiba</shiba> kan?

cta.title: I labɛnna ka bɔ wa?
cta.description: Fara sɛgɛsɛgɛli cɛ yɛlɛmali kan. A bɛ miniti kelen ta ka i ka nafenfɛnw dugu ani ka jago daminɛ.

header.title: Sɛbɛn
header.subtitle: A dɔn token kɔrɔw dugu cogo, jago sɛgɛsɛgɛli cɛ, ani fara Hɔrɔnya Jago kan.

whatIs.title: Mun ye Hɔrɔnya Jago ye?
whatIs.content: Hɔrɔnya Jago ye sariya tɛ cɛmancɛ ye min dilanna ka token kɔrɔw bɔ baara sarali belebele ani sɛgɛsɛgɛli kelen dan la. Ka ERC20 tokenw dugu xERC20 (sɛgɛsɛgɛli cɛ ERC20) nafenfɛn na, mɔgɔw bɛ se ka u ka nafa taa lafiya la sɛgɛsɛgɛli minw bɛ sɔrɔ u kan sani ka token fɔlɔ taali saraw ta.
whatIs.taxFreeDesc: Token kɔrɔw ka teli ka 10%+ sara ta. Token dugulenw bɛ 0% sara ta.

howToConvert.title: Tokenw Dugu Cogo
howToConvert.step1: I ka bɔrɔsiɲɛbara fara bɔ yɔrɔ sɛgɛsɛgɛli kan (misali, BNB Chain).
howToConvert.step3: Token kɔrɔ sugandi i b'a fɛ ka min dugu.
howToConvert.step4: Lockbox ladan sɔn ka i ka tokenw fite.
howToConvert.step5: Digi Dugu kan ka i ka token kɔrɔw bila ani ka "OG" token hakɛ kelen sɔrɔ.
howToConvert.note: A dɔn: Dugu bɛ token kɔrɔ baara sara ta (bila tuma) n'i ka token bɛ sara ta taali la, ka tɛmɛ san ni feere kan. Nka, n'a dugula, taali ni jago bɛɛ minw bɛ na o kɔ, u bɔra nin sara la.

supportedNetworks.title: Sɛgɛsɛgɛli Sɔrɔlenw
supportedNetworks.content: Hɔrɔnya Jago bɛ {{count}}+ sɛgɛsɛgɛli kura sɔrɔ, ka baara lafiya to EVM kɔnɔ.

xerc20.title: xERC20 Sariya
xerc20.content: xERC20 sariya (EIP-7281) b'a to token dilanbagaw bɛ se ka u ka jago mara u yɛrɛ ye sani ka ɲɛ kelen di sɛgɛsɛgɛli cɛ taali kama. Hɔrɔnya Jago bɛ xERC20 ta ka a lajɛ ko "so" hakilila bɛ yen token kama tuma bɛɛ sani ka dilan/jɛni dan bila kɔrɔlen kama.

axelar.title: Axelar Cira
axelar.content: An bɛ Axelar ta an ka baara cɛ la. Axelar ye cira sariya ye min b'a to an bɛ se ka yamaruya tɛ sɛgɛsɛgɛli cɛ sira dilan sɛgɛsɛgɛli bɛɛ cɛ. Ka tɛmɛ jago kɔrɔw kan minw bɛ la sɛgɛsɛgɛbaga cɛmancɛw la, Axelar b'a to an bɛ Sɛgɛsɛgɛli Cɛ Kɔrɔlen (ISMs) dilan ka cira sɛgɛsɛgɛ an ka kɔrɔlen mako la.

migration.title: Lockbox Baara
migration.content: Lockbox ye ladan hakilima ye min bɛ bɔ yɔrɔ sɛgɛsɛgɛli kan (misali, BSC). A bɛ token kɔrɔw mara. N'i bɛ tokenw dugu, i bɛ bila Lockbox kɔnɔ. N'i bɛ dajɛ, i bɛ xERC20 jɛni ka token fɔlɔw bɔ Lockbox kɔnɔ. Nin bɛ 1:1 mara tuma bɛɛ.

security.title: Kɔrɔlen Cogoya
security.content: Kɔrɔlen ka kɔrɔ. An bɛ kɔrɔlen tɔn caman ta:
security.point1: Lockbox Lɔcogo: Token kɔrɔw bɛ mara ladan hakilima sɛgɛsɛgɛlen ni yɛlɛmabali kɔnɔ.
security.point2: Axelar Validators: Sɛgɛsɛgɛli Cɛ Kɔrɔlen bɛ cira sɛgɛsɛgɛ sɛgɛsɛgɛli cɛ.
security.point3: Dan Bila: Dilan ni jɛni dan gɛlɛn bɛ dilan dan tɛ ban bali.
security.point4: Ladan Sɛgɛsɛgɛlen: Dilannen OpenZeppelin ni Axelar sariya tɔn kan.

supplyCommon.verificationDesc: Hakɛ jatedenw bɛɛ bɛ se ka sɛgɛsɛgɛ sariya kan:

tigerogSupply.title: TigerOG Hakɛ Jateden
tigerogSupply.intro: TigerOG hakɛ bɛ bɔ BNBTiger token kɔrɔ la. Jateden bɛ token jɛninenw ni maralenw bɛɛ ta.
tigerogSupply.deadAddressDesc: Token minw cira 0x000...dEaD ma, olu jɛnina abada, u tɛ se ka sɔrɔ tuguni. Nin bɛ token jɛninenw ta BNBTiger sara sira fɛ.
tigerogSupply.contractBalanceDesc: Token dɔɔnin minɛna BNBTiger ladan kɔnɔ. Olu tɛ se ka sɔrɔ, u bɔra jago la.
tigerogSupply.lpLockedDesc: PancakeSwap wari yɔrɔ bɛ BNBTiger ni BNB tokenw mara. N'a LP tokenw jɛnina (ka ci adirɛsi safunen ma), token minw bɛ wari yɔrɔ kɔnɔ, olu bɛ mara abada.
tigerogSupply.lpBurnedPercent: LP token jɛninen: 86.18% LP token bɛɛ la
tigerogSupply.lpLockedPercent: O la, 86.18% tokenw wari yɔrɔ kɔnɔ marala abada
tigerogSupply.note: A dɔn: TigerOG bɛ 1:1 mara ni BNBTiger ye yɛlɛmali tuma. TigerOG hakɛ bɛ bɛn BNBTiger hakɛ tiɲɛ ma, jɛninenw ni maralenw bɔlen kɔ.
tigerogSupply.launchData: Daminɛ Jateden: Nin jatedenw kɛra daminɛ tuma. BNBTiger token kɔrɔ bɛ tɛmɛ ka jɛni san/feere bɛɛ la, o la hakɛ tiɲɛ bɛ se ka dɔgɔya dɔɔnin.

lionogSupply.title: LionOG Hakɛ Jateden
lionogSupply.intro: LionOG hakɛ bɛ bɔ BNBLion token kɔrɔ la. Jateden bɛ token jɛninenw ni maralenw bɛɛ ta.
lionogSupply.deadAddressDesc: Token minw cira 0x000...dEaD ma, olu jɛnina abada, u tɛ se ka sɔrɔ tuguni. Nin bɛ token jɛninenw ta BNBLion sara sira fɛ.
lionogSupply.contractBalanceDesc: Token dɔɔnin minɛna BNBLion ladan kɔnɔ. Olu tɛ se ka sɔrɔ, u bɔra jago la.
lionogSupply.lpLockedDesc: PancakeSwap wari yɔrɔ bɛ BNBLion tokenw mara. N'a LP tokenw jɛnina (ka ci adirɛsi safunen ma), token minw bɛ wari yɔrɔ kɔnɔ, olu bɛ mara abada.
lionogSupply.lpBurnedPercent: LP token jɛninen: 99.98% LP token bɛɛ la
lionogSupply.lpLockedPercent: O la, 99.98% tokenw wari yɔrɔ kɔnɔ marala abada
lionogSupply.note: A dɔn: LionOG bɛ 1:1 mara ni BNBLion ye yɛlɛmali tuma. LionOG hakɛ bɛ bɛn BNBLion hakɛ tiɲɛ ma, jɛninenw ni maralenw bɔlen kɔ.
lionogSupply.launchData: Daminɛ Jateden: Nin jatedenw kɛra daminɛ tuma. BNBLion token kɔrɔ bɛ tɛmɛ ka jɛni san/feere bɛɛ la, o la hakɛ tiɲɛ bɛ se ka dɔgɔya dɔɔnin.

frogogSupply.title: FrogOG Hakɛ Jateden
frogogSupply.intro: FrogOG hakɛ bɛ bɔ BNBFrog token kɔrɔ la. Jateden bɛ token jɛninenw ni maralenw bɛɛ ta.
frogogSupply.deadAddressDesc: Token minw cira 0x000...dEaD ma, olu jɛnina abada, u tɛ se ka sɔrɔ tuguni. Nin bɛ token jɛninenw ta BNBFrog sara sira fɛ.
frogogSupply.contractBalanceDesc: Token dɔɔnin minɛna BNBFrog ladan kɔnɔ. Olu tɛ se ka sɔrɔ, u bɔra jago la.
frogogSupply.lpLockedDesc: PancakeSwap wari yɔrɔ bɛ BNBFrog tokenw mara. N'a LP tokenw jɛnina (ka ci adirɛsi safunen ma), token minw bɛ wari yɔrɔ kɔnɔ, olu bɛ mara abada.
frogogSupply.lpBurnedPercent: LP token jɛninen: 99.31% LP token bɛɛ la
frogogSupply.lpLockedPercent: O la, 99.31% tokenw wari yɔrɔ kɔnɔ marala abada
frogogSupply.note: A dɔn: FrogOG bɛ 1:1 mara ni BNBFrog ye yɛlɛmali tuma. FrogOG hakɛ bɛ bɛn BNBFrog hakɛ tiɲɛ ma, jɛninenw ni maralenw bɔlen kɔ.
frogogSupply.launchData: Daminɛ Jateden: Nin jatedenw kɛra daminɛ tuma. BNBFrog token kɔrɔ bɛ tɛmɛ ka jɛni san/feere bɛɛ la, o la hakɛ tiɲɛ bɛ se ka dɔgɔya dɔɔnin.

header.title: Ladan Hakilima
header.subtitle: Boli adirɛsiw tokenw, taayɔrɔw, ani wari bɛ yen yɔrɔw Hɔrɔnya Jago kɔnɔ.

faq.title: Hɔrɔnya Jago Dɛmɛ
faq.subtitle: Jaabiw ɲininiw kan dugu, jago, ani kɔrɔlen kan.

cta.title: I ka ɲininiw bɛ yen halisa?
cta.description: Fara an ka jama kan Discord kan walima Wiki lajɛ ka baara ɲɛfɔli sɔrɔ.

questions.q1: Mun ye n ka tokenw dugu kun ye?
questions.a1: I ka tokenw dugu Hɔrɔnya Jago sariya (xERC20) la bɛ baara sara bɔ (teli ka kɛ 10-12%) token kɔrɔ la. A b'a to fana i bɛ se ka nin tokenw jago ka taa sɛgɛsɛgɛli wɛrɛw la i n'a fɔ Base, Ethereum, ani caman wɛrɛ, ka DeFi ni wari bɛ yen sɔrɔ yɔrɔ bɛɛ.
questions.q2: Hɔrɔnya Jago baara ka lafiya wa?
questions.a2: Awɔ. Sariya bɛ Lockbox baara sɛgɛsɛgɛlen jama fɛ ani OpenZeppelin ladan sariya ta. I ka token fɔlɔw bɛ datugu ladan hakilima kɔnɔ bɔ yɔrɔ sɛgɛsɛgɛli kan, ani 1:1 bɛ dilan. I bɛ se ka i ka token fɔlɔw sɔrɔ tuma bɛɛ n'i ye dugu sugya jɛni.
questions.a3: Hɔrɔnya Jago sariya yɛrɛ tɛ sara ta dugu walima dajɛ la. I bɛ sɛgɛsɛgɛli gazi sara dɔrɔn sara. Nka, jago sɛgɛsɛgɛli cɛ (misali, BSC ka taa Base) bɛ sara dɔɔnin ta ka cira sɛgɛsɛgɛli cɛ sara Axelar fɛ.
questions.q4: Mun bɛ kɛ n'n ye n ka token dugulenw tunun?
questions.a4: Token dugulenw bɛ kɛ i n'a fɔ ERC20 token wɛrɛ. N'i ye i ka bɔrɔsiɲɛbara tunun walima k'a ci adirɛsi tiɲɛnen ma, u tɛ se ka sɔrɔ. A lajɛ tuma bɛɛ ko i bɛ ci adirɛsi ɲuman ma ani i ka kɔnɔna kilew mara.
questions.q5: N bɛ se ka n ka tokenw dajɛ ka segin fɔlɔ ma wa?
questions.a5: Awɔ. I bɛ se ka i ka "OG" (dugulen) tokenw dajɛ ka segin token kɔrɔ ma tuma bɛɛ bɔ yɔrɔ sɛgɛsɛgɛli kan. Baara bɛ token dugulen jɛni ani ka fɔlɔ bɔ Lockbox kɔnɔ.
questions.a6: An bɛ sɛgɛsɛgɛli 50 ni kɔ sɔrɔ Ethereum, BNB Chain, Base, Arbitrum, Optimism, Polygon, Avalanche, ani caman wɛrɛ bɛ a la. Wiki lajɛ ka sɛgɛsɛgɛli sɔrɔlenw bɛɛ ye.
questions.a7: Jago teliya bɛ bɔ yɔrɔ sɛgɛsɛgɛli laban waati ni Axelar cira tɔn kan. Teli ka kɛ, taali ka bɔ BSC ka taa sɛgɛsɛgɛli wɛrɛ la bɛ ta miniti 1-3.
questions.q8: OG tokenw hakɛ jumɛn bɛ yen?
questions.a8: OG token kelen-kelen bɛɛ hakɛ bɛ bɔ a ka BNB token kɔrɔ la, ka token jɛninenw, ladan kɔnɔna wari, ani LP maralenw ta. TigerOG: ~3.66 septillion (36.62% kɔrɔ la). LionOG: ~3.83 septillion (38.33% kɔrɔ la). FrogOG: ~8.39 septillion (83.86% kɔrɔ la). Wiki lajɛ ka a ɲɛfɔli bɛɛ ye.

common.failedToSwitchNetwork: Sɛgɛsɛgɛli yɛlɛma tiɲɛna. I k'a yɛlɛma ni bolo ye i ka bɔrɔsiɲɛbara kɔnɔ.
common.unableToDetermineGas: A tɛ se ka Axelar gazi sara ɲɛfɔ
